OCD.name: Publisher
OCD.description: A wire component which publishes data to the cloud platform

AD.name: CloudPublisher Target Filter
AD.description: Specifies, as an OSGi target filter, the pid of the Cloud Publisher used to publish messages to the cloud platform.

AD.name: Publish Position
AD.description: Whether or not the gateway's position should be published in the message. Choices are: None - means that no position will be published; Basic - only altitude, longitude and latitude values will be published; Full - available NMEA properties will be mapped to a KuraPosition object and published.
